articles.title: Bangladeshi Ambassador Presents Credentials to Kim Yong Nam
Pak Ui Chun Meets New Bangladeshi Ambassador
13th Paektusan Cup Sports Contest Opens
articles.content:
Pak Ui Chun Meets New Bangladeshi Ambassador 
   Pyongyang, January 23 (KCNA) -- Pak Ui Chun, foreign minister of the DPRK, met and had a talk with Munshi Faiz Ahmad, Bangladeshi ambassador newly accredited to the DPRK who paid a courtesy call on him on Jan. 23.
